name: Beachcomber Motel and Apartments

reviews.title: strange breakfast policy!
reviews.text: staff were friendly upon check-in. we were given a queen room which was clean. nice towels provided. bathroom small but perfectly adequate. short walk from the town but its easy to drive to the main strip if its raining or you dont want to walk. lots of noise from next door but not quite sure if it was becasue the walls were thin or they were just making excessive noise.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we wanted to order breakfast but put off by the fact you recieved the breakfast items the night before??!! no cooked breakfast on offer :(
reviews.title: our stay at the beachcomber apollo bay

reviews.text: my main concern was that on looking at their website all the budget rooms had small tv's and the all the other rooms in the picture are decent sized plasma tv s but the room we got had a really small screen. we had planned to watch a film so were a lttle dissapointed by that.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay at the Beachcomber motels Apollo bay.

reviews.text: otherwise fine for an overnight stay.
reviews.title: Nice helpful staff dated rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Checked in on the 21st of Sep 2011 for one night,we had a lovely apartment which was spotlessly clean.Alison and Chris have cleanliness as top priority which is very important.We found them very pleasant and suggested places of interest for us to visit.We enjoyed our stay so much we stayed another night. We would stay there again and have no hesitation in recommending it to anyone looking for accommodation in that area.
reviews.title: Very warm & cosy, quiet, relaxing and we'll be back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We hired the family apartment even though we were a couple, and it was outstanding. Open fire, loads of room, full kitchen, and spa bath. This is a great base from which to explore the Otway National Park and see koalas in the wild. Awesome beach, seafood shop, restaurants and shopping. Highly reccomended
reviews.title: An awesome winter hide away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Modern, neat, clean, sapcious with all the usual country motel inclusions PLUS the added attraction of a spa and fire in the room.
reviews.title: Space, comfort and fire and spa in the room. Very relaxing.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in this motel for two nights in June 2011. The “Studio Apartment” was clean, spacious and well equipped to cook you own food and clean up afterwards. It was great value for money. The shower/toilet was also large, clean and recently renovated. The motel is two roads back from the Great Ocean Road so the area is very quiet but within easy walking distance of great eating places and shops. We were a little nervous about staying at this motel because of the poor reviews but we were met by a lady looking after the place who was exceptionally nice and helpful. She told us the owners would be in the next day, and conveyed their apologies that they were not there to meet us.
reviews.title: Great room, location and welcoming hosts

reviews.text: The next day the owners showed up and Alison came over to welcome us with a friendly smile and warm handshake, Chris we met later in the day and he was equally welcoming.
reviews.title: Great hosts and wonderful rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would we stay again? Without a doubt, the motel and owners suited us down to the ground and it is disappointing that some visitors formed such a negative view, completely the opposite of ours.
reviews.title: highly recommend, fantastic owners, will return.

reviews.text: I'm surprised at the previous comments, I found the Beachcomber very comfortable and great value for money.
reviews.title: Great value and very welcoming.

reviews.text: The rooms were very clean and the shower very hot (after walking in the cold).
reviews.title: rude

reviews.text: I found the couple who ran the motel very welcoming and they went out of their way to make us feel comfortable, also giving us great advise on where to go in the area.....also directions!
reviews.title: Made me feel unwelcome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall a very happy relaxed experience.
reviews.title: Very small and a little bit run down, but clean and good located

aka: Beachcomber Motel And Apartments Apollo Bay/Great Ocean Road
